rule.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildAudit
rule.description: Primary rule to calculate audits between old and new objects (handles arrays or single objects)
rule.definition: #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_165782-adt"( originalObjects: ri!originalObjects, newObjects: ri!newObjects, auditConfig: ri!auditConfig, username: ri!username )

el.a:name: Delete and Add (Array and Non Array)

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: {'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_Parent'( parentId: 1, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 2, text: "", date: today() ), complexChildSingle: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildSingle'( childId: 3, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 4, text: "", date: today() ), ), complexChildMultiple: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( parentId: 1, childId: 5, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 6, text: "", date: today() ), ) } )}

{'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_Parent'( parentId: 1, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 2, text: "", date: today() ), complexChildSingle: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildSingle'( childId: 3, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 4, text: "", date: today() ), ), complexChildMultiple: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( parentId: 1, childId: 5, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 6, text: "", date: today() ), ) } )}

{'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_Parent'( parentId: 1, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 2, text: "", date: today() ), complexChildSingle: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildSingle'( childId: 3, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 4, text: "", date: today() ), ), complexChildMultiple: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( parentId: 1, childId: 5, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 6, text: "", date: today() ), ) } )}

{'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_Parent'( parentId: 1, text: "New Text", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 2, text: "New Text", date: today() ), complexChildSingle: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildSingle'( childId: 3, text: "New Text", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 9, text: "New Text", date: today() ), ), complexChildMultiple: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( parentId: 1, childId: 5, text: "New Text", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 6, text: "", date: today() ), ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( parentId: 1, childId: 7, text: "New Text", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 8, text: "New Text", date: today() ), ) } )}
